query.statement:
SELECT P.PSPID ,SUBSTR(M.NAME1,7,24) AS NAME1 ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(M.NAME1,7,24) = '승강기안전관리원' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTR(M.NAME1,31) END AS NAME2 ,SUBSTR(P.POSID,8) AS HOGIT FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0037 AS P ,SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS M WHERE P.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND P.MANDT = M.MANDT AND P.CODE2 = M.LIFNR AND P.DATE1 != '00000000'
#GUBUN+#
ORDER BY SUBSTR(M.NAME1,7,24),SUBSTR(M.NAME1,31),P.PSPID,P.POSID
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
